limit_to_max_size[source]

limit_to_max_size(img, max_size)

Limit the image size to max size and scale the image, if max size exceeded. img: The image to validate as OpenCV image. max_size: The max allowed image size. :return: The eventually resized opencv image.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

fit_to_max_size[source]

fit_to_max_size(img, max_width, max_height)

Limit the image size to maximum width and height and scale the image, if size exceeded. img: The image to validate as OpenCV Image. max_width: The max allowed image width. max_height: The max allowed image height. :return: The eventually resized OpenCV image.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

load_image[source]

load_image(fname)

Load an image using the OpenCV library fname: the file path or BytesIO stream return: the Pillow image

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

load_from_base64[source]

load_from_base64(img_b64, img_format=1)

Load an image as base64 string using the Pillow library img_b64: the image as base64 string return: the Pillow image

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

get_image_size[source]

get_image_size(fname)

Calculates image size of a given image file. fname: the file path return: the OpenCV image, image width and height

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

from_pillow_image[source]

from_pillow_image(img)

Converts a Pillow image to OpenCV image. img: the Pillow image return: the OpenCV image

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

convert_to_base64[source]

convert_to_base64(image, image_type='PNG')

Converts the specified image into a base64 version of itself. Source code mainly taken from: https://jdhao.github.io/2020/03/17/base64_opencv_pil_image_conversion/ image: The image to transform as CV2 Image. image_type: The image type. :return: The base64 encoded version of the image.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
